topic: Automated Reply " Radiance installation on Mac OS X 10.5.6"
body:
This is an automated reply to your message "Re: [Radiance-general] Radiance installation on Mac OS X 10.5.6" sent to chris at zed-uk.com.


Dear Thomas Bleicher <tbleicher at googlemail.com>


Thank you for your email. I am away from the office the 7th November 2009.  I will be receiving my emails, but may not be able to reply to them promptly. If you have an urgent query please contact the office on 0161 3386200 where one of my colleagues will hopefully be able to assist with your query.


Thanks


Chris
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2009-November/006329.html).</sup>
